name: Auto No Auto-Retry
description: Turns off auto-retry after a set percentage.

enable.name: Enable
enable.description: Whether or not the mod is enabled.

percentage.name: Percentage
percentage.description: The percentage of the level that must be completed before auto-retry is turned off.

new-best.name: On New Best
new-best.description: Turn off auto-retry when reaching a new best percentage in normal mode. This will override the manual percentage setting.

start-pos.name: Include Testmode
start-pos.description: Turn off auto-retry even when playing from a Start Pos.
